meanings.definition: Ligases: enzymes that catalyze the joining of two molecules by forming a chemical bond
meanings.sent1: The ligases in our body help molecules stick together.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study ligases to understand how molecules bond.
meanings.sent3: The ligases at the molecular party were busy making new friends.
meanings.sent4: In the chemical dance of life, ligases are the matchmakers.
meanings.sent5: Under the microscope, the ligases worked tirelessly to connect the molecules.

meanings.definition: Ligases: proteins that play a key role in DNA repair and replication
meanings.sent1: DNA repair relies on the ligases to fix mistakes.
meanings.sent2: Cells need ligases to ensure DNA replication is accurate.
meanings.sent3: The ligases in the DNA team were the superheroes of the cell.
meanings.sent4: Like tiny repair crews, ligases mend the DNA strands.
meanings.sent5: In the intricate world of genetics, ligases are the guardians of DNA integrity.
